Click a 'Settings' button to open a dropdown menu
Verify the dropdown menu is visible, positioned directly below the button, with background #ffffff and border 1px solid #ced4da
Verify the dropdown menu box shadow is '0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'
Verify exactly 3 menu items are present: 'Profile', 'Account', 'Logout'
Verify each menu item has padding 10px 15px, font size 15px, and text color #333333
Verify dropdown menu items have normal word spacing and normal letter spacing
Verify the dropdown menu z-index is 1000
Verify the 'Play' button on a video player is visible, has a triangle icon (SVG fill color #ffffff), and aria-label 'Play video'
Verify the 'Mute' button is visible, has a speaker icon, and current state indicates not muted
Click 'Play' button
Verify 'Play' button changes to 'Pause' (two vertical bars icon) and video starts playing
Click 'Mute' button
Verify speaker icon changes to muted icon and video sound is muted
Verify the control bar has background color rgba(0,0,0,0.6) and height 50px
Verify the control bar's offset height is 50px
Start a file upload
Verify a progress indicator appears showing 'Uploading file.jpg'
Verify the progress percentage text updates from 0% to 100% smoothly over a 5000ms animation
Verify the progress bar's background color is #e0e0e0 and the filled portion is #4CAF50
Verify upon completion, status text changes to 'Upload complete' with color #4CAF50, and the progress bar hides (opacity 0) after 1000ms
Verify clip property is 'rect(0, 0, 0, 0)' for hidden accessibility elements during upload
Open an image gallery
Verify images are displayed in a grid layout (display 'grid')
Verify grid has 3 columns (grid-template-columns 'repeat(3, 1fr)') and row gap 20px and column gap 20px
Verify each image thumbnail is 200x150px, has 1px solid border #cccccc, and border-radius 4px
Verify hovering over an image adds box shadow '0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.2)' with 200ms transition
Verify images have background size 'cover' and are clickable
Verify max height is 150px and overflow is 'hidden' for each thumbnail
Open a date picker input field
Verify current month 'October 2023' is displayed at top with font size 18px and text align 'center'
Verify the 'Previous Month' arrow button is visible on left, clickable, with fill color #333333
Verify the 'Next Month' arrow button is visible on right, clickable, with fill color #333333
Click 'Next Month' button
Verify the displayed month changes to 'November 2023'
Verify each date cell has width 40px and height 40px, and its display property is 'grid'
Verify the display property for the calendar is 'block'
